DOC.brief_summary: This study compare kinematics data collect patient implant create different manufacturer see implant provide normal-like kinematic pattern compare normal knee .
DOC.brief_title: In Vivo Kinematics Comparison Stryker Zimmer Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: A good understanding knee joint kinematics important explain premature polyethylene wear failure within knee implant help design prosthesis closely approximate normal knee . Therefore , objective study compare vivo kinematic pattern subject implant either Stryker Triathlon Posterior Cruciate Retaining ( PCR ) Total Knee Arthroplasty ( TKA ) Zimmer NexGen PCR TKA design determine kinematic difference TKA design . Each subject ask undergo fluoroscopic evaluation perform weight-bearing activity surveillance use University Tennessee 's new mobile track fluoroscopic unit perform deep knee bend ramp ramp activity . The mobile fluoroscopy unit approve use State Tennessee study-by-study basis IRB approval obtain study .
DOC.criteria: Must least 3 month postoperative surgical procedure conduct within past 6 month Must body weight less 250 lb Must Body Mass Index less 38 Must judge clinically successful Knee Society Score > 90 Must 100 % postoperative passive flexion ligamentous laxity pain Must able walk level ground without aid kind Must able ascend descend ramp 10 degree incline assistance Must willing sign Informed Consent HIPAA form Must 160 cm ( 5 ' 3 ) 193 cm ( 6 ' 4 ) tall Pregnant potentially pregnant female Unwilling sign Informed Consent HIPAA form
